properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Viriviga naasheervaadamu losagun Maruvaku Yesuni yupakaaram dhara Neekunnadi devunide yani korina prabhukidu Thwara paduchu ghanambu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Darshinchina nee dayagala prabhuvunaku Harshamutho kotlanu vippi viriviga muriyuchu Prabhuvunaku anniyu arpinchi Koniyaadedamu ghanambu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thanayunilo mana kanniyu nidenu manalanu Munde thana kidenu paanaarpanamuga Prabhu karpinchi kaalam banthayu Gadipedamu ghanambu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Santasamuga nidute prabhu chittamu entho Melukavutho nundi chintimpaka nidute Sariyarpana vintagu vruddini Pondedamu ghanambu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Pisini thanambuga doshaarpana nida vaasamu Cheyunu leshamulu Yeseuniki nee Jeevana miyyanu shaashanamide Prabhu dani yerugu ghanambu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ghana parachunu prabhu manassaaraga nida Kaanuka gaa bala kaalamulu manakenno thana Gunamula nidi ghanamunu balamunu Prabhu vosagun ghanambu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Makedonia sanghamu vale neeku Sakala ikkatlundinanu shakhtiki Minchi saagina gaani makkuvagaa nidi Mana milanu ghanambu{/lang-eng}
